00048 /*****************************************************************************\
00049  *
00050  *  File:  l_ru_interface.c
00051  *
00052  *  Description:
00053  *    Lcode interface to RU manager for building RU_Info structures
00054  *
00055  *  Creation Date : May 1993
00056  *
00057  *  Authors : Scott Mahlke, John Gyllenhaal
00058  *
00059  *  Revision 1.1.1.1  1995/08/30 16:49:03  david
00060  *  Import of IMPACT source
00061  *
00062  * Revision 1.1  1994/01/19  18:49:25  roger
00063  * Initial revision
00064  *
00065  *
00066 \*****************************************************************************/
00067 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00068 #include <config.h>
00069 #include "l_schedule.h"
00070 #include "RU_manager.h"
00071 #include "l_ru_interface.h"
00072 
00073 /*
00074  *      Assume RU_set_max_pred() called before this!!!!!!!!
00075  */
00076 
00077 RU_Info* L_create_ru_info_oper (oper)
00078 L_Oper *oper;
00079 {
00080     int i, *pred;
00081     RU_Info *ru_info = NULL;
00082 
00083     /* check if oper is to be ignored by the scheduler */
00084     if (op_flag_set(oper->proc_opc, OP_FLAG_IGNORE))
00085         return (ru_info);
00086 
00087     /* create array of predicate registers */
00088     pred = RU_pred_alloc();
00089 
00090     /* Only permit one predicate for now - RAB */
00091     for (i=0; i< 1 /* L_max_pred_operand */; i++) {
00092         if (oper->pred[i]==NULL)
00093             pred[i] = 0;
00094         else if (L_is_register(oper->pred[i]))
00095             pred[i] = oper->pred[i]->value.r;
00096         else
00097             L_punt("L_initialize_ru_info: illegal pred operand");
00098     }
00099 
00100     /* create info structure */
00101     ru_info = RU_info_create(oper, pred);
00102     ru_info->proc_opc = oper->proc_opc;
00103 
00104     return ru_info;
00105 }
00106 
00107 #if 0
00108 void L_create_ru_info_cb (cb)
00109 L_Cb *cb;
00110 {
00111     L_Oper *oper;
00112 
00113     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op) {
00114         L_create_ru_info_oper(oper);
00115     }
00116 }
00117 
00118 void L_create_ru_info_fn (fn)
00119 L_Func *fn;
00120 {
00121     L_Cb *cb;
00122 
00123     for (cb=fn->first_cb; cb!=NULL; cb=cb->next_cb) {
00124         L_create_ru_info_cb(cb);
00125     }
00126 }
00127 #endif
00128 
00129 void L_delete_ru_info_oper (ru_info)
00130 RU_Info *ru_info;
00131 {
00132     if (ru_info!=NULL) RU_info_delete(ru_info);
00133 }
00134 
00135 #if 0
00136 void L_delete_ru_info_cb (cb)
00137 L_Cb *cb;
00138 {
00139     L_Oper *oper;
00140 
00141     for (oper=cb->first_op; oper!=NULL; oper=oper->next_op) {
00142         L_delete_ru_info_oper(oper);
00143     }
00144 }
00145 
00146 void L_delete_ru_info_fn (fn)
00147 L_Func *fn;
00148 {
00149     L_Cb *cb;
00150 
00151     for (cb=fn->first_cb; cb!=NULL; cb=cb->next_cb) {
00152         L_delete_ru_info_cb(cb);
00153     }
00154 }
